content: http://motorcycleguy.blogspot.com/2018/10/challenges-using-smart-on-fhir-for.html @Keith Boone I don't agree with some of what you wrote here
It's more a statement that we've combined the process of conformance inspection with the problem of endpoint discovery
how so? end-point discovery is not in the picture for Argonaut. but once you have an endpoint, inspection is fine...
@Graham feel free to comment, or if you want, send me a guest post in response! Would love to hear your thoughts.
